Easily view your current IP address with just a click. IP Viewer is a sleek and modern Chrome extension designed to provide your public IP address in an instant, right from your browser toolbar.

Features:
Instant Access: View your IP address with one click on the extension icon.
Modern Design: Enjoy a clean, professional, and user-friendly interface.
Lightweight: Minimalistic design ensures it runs smoothly without impacting your browsing experience.
Secure: No tracking, just your IP address when you need it.

Why IP Viewer?
Whether you're troubleshooting network issues, setting up servers, or simply curious about your IP address, IP Viewer provides a quick and easy solution. Say goodbye to navigating through multiple websites to find your IP address â€“ now it's always just one click away!
